name: Solusi Teknologi Informasi (SOLUTIF)
client: Dinas Komunikasi dan Informatika Kabupaten Sukoharjo
overview: SOLUTIF is a system that coordinates questions and complaints about the applications concerned and can provide solutions to these problems and questions; provide opportunities and realize collaboration between government agencies in carrying out government affairs and tasks to achieve common goals; and improve the quality and range of public services to employees and the community.
job_description:
1. Frontend Development: Using Tailwind CSS and jQuery to implement responsive user interface design.
  2.  UI Slicing: Translating designs from the UI/UX team into structured and efficient HTML and CSS code.
  3. Backend Development: Building business logic and server services using Laravel, ensuring optimal application performance.
  4. API Integration: Implement and manage RESTful APIs to support communication between frontend and backend.
  5. Application Maintenance: Perform debugging and maintenance to ensure the application runs smoothly.

name: Sistem Informasi Penatausaahan
client: Dinas Komunikasi dan Informatika Kabupaten Karanganyar
overview: This system aims to assist government employees in making letters with various features that can speed up the process. It is hoped that this system can also help facilitate the management of more and more letters.

name: GuruneAI
client: Lomba Akademik Mobile App Design IT SPECTA - Universitas Muhammadiyah Surakarta
overview: GuruneAI is an innovative education app that utilizes artificial intelligence to create an adaptive and interactive learning experience in the era of smart cities. The app offers various learning methods such as text, video, audio, and interactive quizzes, allowing students to choose the way of learning that suits them best. With the Guru AI feature, students can ask questions at any time and get detailed explanations, while the available discussion forums help build a collaborative learning community. GuruneAI ensures the materials are always up-to-date, so students always get the latest and relevant information.

name: PERKASA (PERangkat Kepegawaian Aktualisasi Sumberdaya Anda)
overview: The PERKASA application is designed to help HRDs and employees manage various aspects of human resources more efficiently and transparently. With key features such as attendance, requests, payroll, announcements, and manage employees, the app allows HRDs to monitor attendance, manage leave requests and salary increases, automatically calculate salaries, and deliver important announcements. Employees can also access personal information, submit requests, and view announcements easily, thereby increasing workplace satisfaction and productivity.

name: Synauw
overview: Synauw is a mobile application designed to help users learn digital skills such as design and coding through structured and engaging online courses. The app presents directed and interactive material, so users can learn more effectively and not feel bored. With features such as quizzes, hands-on projects, and learning communities, Synauw ensures a learning experience that supports all-round digital skills development.

name: Narasee
client: Lomba Akademik Mobile App Design IT SPECTA - Universitas Muhammadiyah Surakarta
overview: Narasee is an AI-based app that makes it easy to create professional presentation videos without the need for recording or editing skills. Users simply upload a photo of themselves, a voice recording, and a video script, and Narasee automatically combines the elements into a compelling, ready-to-use video. With additional features such as background options, the app allows anyone to create personalized and memorable video presentations with ease.

name: SliceHub
overview: Collection of User Interface slicing results from existing applications.

name: Sistem Penerbitan Surat Perintah Pencairan Dana
client: Dinas Komunikasi dan Informatika Kabupaten Karanganyar
overview: Sistem yang membantu pemerintahan dalam mengefektifkan proses penerbitan Surat Perintah Pencairan Dana di Kabupaten Karanganyar.
